


#define ll long long
#define gcd __gcd
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define fi first
#define se second
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define N 1000001
using namespace std;

int readInt () {
	bool minus = false;
	int result = 0;
	char ch;
	ch = getchar();
	while (true) {
		if (ch == '-') break;
		if (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') break;
		ch = getchar();
	}
	if (ch == '-') minus = true; else result = ch-'0';
	while (true) {
		ch = getchar();
		if (ch < '0' || ch > '9') break;
		result = result*10 + (ch - '0');
	}
	if (minus)
		return -result;
	else
		return result;
}

ll readLong () {
	bool minus = false;
	ll result = 0;
	char ch;
	ch = getchar();
	while (true) {
		if (ch == '-') break;
		if (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') break;
		ch = getchar();
	}
	if (ch == '-') minus = true; else result = ch-'0';
	while (true) {
		ch = getchar();
		if (ch < '0' || ch > '9') break;
		result = result*10 + (ch - '0');
	}
	if (minus)
		return -result;
	else
		return result;
}

ll p(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll temp;
    if(b==0)
    return 1;
    temp=p(a,b/2)%mod;
    if(b&1)
    return (((a*temp)%mod)*temp)%mod;
    else
    return (temp*temp)%mod;
}

 int i,j,k,n,m,q,k1,k2;


  int ar[1000001]={0};
  int temp[1000001]={0};
 pair<int,int>ar1[1000001];
 int a,b;
  int main()
  {
 int h=0;     
n=readInt();
q=readInt();
while(q--)
{
	a=readInt();
	b=readInt();
	if(a>sqrt(n))
	{
		for(j=b;j<=n;j+=a)
		{
		ar[j]+=1;	
		}
	}
	else
	{
		ar1[h].fi=a;
		ar1[h].se=b;
		h++;
	}
}

sort(ar1,ar1+h);

int g=0;
while(g<h)
{
		
	while(g+1<h && ar1[g].fi==ar1[g+1].fi)
	{
		temp[ar1[g].se]+=1;
		g++;
	}
	temp[ar1[g].se]+=1;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{	temp[i]=temp[i]+temp[i-ar1[g].fi];
	ar[i]+=temp[i];
}
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
temp[i]=0;
	g++;
}


for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
printf("%d ",ar[i]);
printf("\n");


	return 0;
}
